control.label: [B]$INFO[ListItem.Label][/B]
control.visible: [[IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo)) + !Container.Content(Seasons)] | [IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(tvshow.clearlogo)) + Container.Content(Seasons)]] | [[Container.Content(TVShows) | Container.Content(Seasons) | Container.Content(Episodes)] + Skin.HasSetting(DisableTVShowsLogo)] | [[Container.Content(Movies) | Container.Content(Sets)] + Skin.HasSetting(DisableMoviesClearLogo)]
